column1: Lou Malnati's Pizzeria////Beat the dinner lines arriving by 5:30p Saturday.  Smartly after taking name for table
column2: they let you order your pizza to start baking.  15 minutes later we were seated
column3: ordered salad and drinks.  30 minutes later after we enjoyed salad
column4: pizza arrives!  Simply delicious pizza.  Staff were all smiles.  Excellent Chicago experience and must do when visiting.
